shadow.name: UNEASE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Gentle, expressing through unease

gift.name: INTUITION
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Gentle, expressing through intuition

siddhi.name: CLARITY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Gentle, expressing through clarity

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 57 shadow frequency. The unease you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural intuition. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from unease to intuition.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your spleen. Notice the sensation of unease.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 57 consciously for 7 days, the unease pattern will shift toward intuition.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 57 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from unease toward intuition
